typed_config.inline_code:
function envoy_on_request(request_handle)
    local authority = request_handle:headers():get(":authority")
    if (authority ~= nil and authority:find("^webapi%.soa") ~= nil) then
        -- return 403 for option method
        local method = request_handle:headers():get(":method")
        if (method ~= nil and string.upper(method) == "OPTIONS") then
            request_handle:respond(
                {[":status"] = "403",
                ["Content-Type"] = "application/json"},
                "{\"status\": {\"message\": \"[GateException]{Options request not allowed to forward}\", \"status_code\": 403}}")
            return
        end

        -- add default context-type
        local contentType = request_handle:headers():get("Content-Type")
        if (contentType == nil or contentType == "") then
            request_handle:headers():replace("Content-Type", "application/json")
        end

        -- add webapi as appid if appid is empty
        local appid = request_handle:headers():get("X-Client-AppId")
        if (appid == nil or appid == '') then
            appid = request_handle:headers():get("SOA20-Client-AppId")
        end
        if (appid == nil or appid == '') then appid = "webapi" end
        if (appid ~= nil and appid ~= '') then
            request_handle:headers():replace("SOA20-Client-AppId",
                                            string.lower(appid))
            request_handle:headers():replace("X-Client-AppId", string.lower(appid))
        end

        -- add x-ctrip-request-source header if not exist
        local requestSource = request_handle:headers():get("x-ctrip-request-source")
        if (requestSource == nil or requestSource == '') then
            requestSource = "webapi"
            request_handle:headers():replace("x-ctrip-request-source", requestSource)
        end
    end
end

function envoy_on_request(request_handle)
  local serviceCodeFromHeader = request_handle:headers():get("X-Wormhole-ServiceCode")
  if (serviceCodeFromHeader ~= nil and serviceCodeFromHeader ~= "") then
    request_handle:headers():replace(":authority", serviceCodeFromHeader .. ".soa.mesh")
  else
    local path = request_handle:headers():get(":path")
    local serviceCode, operation = string.match(path, "^/+api/+(%d+)(/+.*)")
    if (serviceCode ~= nil and serviceCode ~= "") then
        request_handle:headers():replace(":path", operation)
        request_handle:headers():replace(":authority", serviceCode .. ".soa.mesh")
    end
  end
end

    if (authority ~= nil and authority:find("^webapi%.soa") ~= nil) then

        if (method ~= nil and string.upper(method) == "OPTIONS") then

                {[":status"] = "403",
                ["Content-Type"] = "application/json"},
                "{\"status\": {\"message\": \"[GateException]{Options request not allowed to forward}\", \"status_code\": 403}}")

        -- add default context-type
        local contentType = request_handle:headers():get("Content-Type")
        if (contentType == nil or contentType == "") then

        -- add webapi as appid if appid is empty

        if (appid == nil or appid == '') then

        if (appid ~= nil and appid ~= '') then
            request_handle:headers():replace("SOA20-Client-AppId",
                                            string.lower(appid))
            request_handle:headers():replace("X-Client-AppId", string.lower(appid))
        end

        -- add x-ctrip-request-source header if not exist
        local requestSource = request_handle:headers():get("x-ctrip-request-source")
        if (requestSource == nil or requestSource == '') then
            requestSource = "webapi"

end

function envoy_on_request(request_handle)
  local serviceCodeFromHeader = request_handle:headers():get("X-Wormhole-ServiceCode")
  if (serviceCodeFromHeader ~= nil and serviceCodeFromHeader ~= "") then
    request_handle:headers():replace(":authority", serviceCodeFromHeader .. ".soa.mesh")
  else
    local path = request_handle:headers():get(":path")
    local serviceCode, operation = string.match(path, "^/+api/+(%d+)(/+.*)")
    if (serviceCode ~= nil and serviceCode ~= "") then
        request_handle:headers():replace(":path", operation)
        request_handle:headers():replace(":authority", serviceCode .. ".soa.mesh")
    end
  end
end
